tool_description: Validates patient data collection and handling processes for HIPAA compliance, ensuring proper authorization, data protection, and privacy requirements are met.

data_collection_method.description: How data was collected (online_portal, paper_form, phone_interview, in_person)

authorization_obtained.description: Whether patient authorization was obtained for data collection

sharing_entities.description: Entities that will have access to the data

encryption_used.description: Whether data is encrypted at rest and in transit

access_controls_enabled.description: Whether proper access controls are in place

audit_logging_enabled.description: Whether access and modifications are logged

patient_rights_provided.description: Whether patient was informed of their privacy rights

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient must exist in the system.
Invalid collection method: Must be one of [online_portal, paper_form, phone_interview, in_person].
Missing authorization: Patient authorization is required for all data collection.
Invalid data types: Data types must be from approved healthcare data categories.
Retention period violation: Retention period must be between 1 and 30 years.
Security requirement failure: Encryption, access controls, and audit logging are required for HIPAA compliance.
Patient rights violation: Patients must be informed of their privacy rights under HIPAA.
usage: Provide patient ID and detailed information about data collection methods, security measures, and patient authorization to verify HIPAA compliance.

compliance_status.description: Overall HIPAA compliance status (compliant, non_compliant, needs_review)

violations_found.description: List of HIPAA compliance violations identified
